articles.title: India vs Australia, 2nd ODI, Weather Forecast: Rain Threatens To Hamper Match In Visakhapatnam - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Visakhapatnam Weather Report: Rain threat looms over the second ODI between India and Australia in Visakhapatnam.
articles.content: India are slated to take on Australia in the second ODI of the three-match series at the YS Raja Reddy Cricket Stadium in Visakhapatnam on Sunday. The hosts lead the series 1-0 after registering a fi… [+1450 chars]

articles.title: 43-Year-Old Rohan Bopanna Becomes Oldest Indian Wells Champion - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India's Rohan Bopanna became the oldest ATP Masters 1000 champion when he and his Australian partner Matt Ebden claimed the men's doubles crown at the BNP Paribas Open
